projects.name: Above The Stars
projects.description: Above The Stars was a project created during the Factoria's F5 Hackathon and thought as a future science-fiction marketplace where clients would be able to buy and sell starts and constellations. It has a functional product searcher and contact form

projects.name: Cyber To Do List
projects.description: Cyber To Do List is a cyberpunk-themed project where users are able to introduce, read, and delete their tasks.

projects.name: Japon Sweets
projects.description: Japon Sweets is a completly functional e-commerce where clients can buy a wide variety of japanese sweets.

projects.name: Sakura Tarot
projects.description: Sakura Tarot is a simple webpage project in which users are able to play an adivination game where they can get to know their past, present, and future.

projects.name: Tenebris Tattoo
projects.description: Tennebris Tattoo Studio was one of my first approaches to programming, it is a replica from an official template, an exercise of HTML and CSS.

projects.name: Consulting Room
projects.description: Consulting Room is a webpage CRUD-based where users are able to introduce, read, edit, and delete their consultations
